original_text: After some days he returned to take her. And he turned aside to see the carcass of the lion, and behold, there was a swarm of bees in the body of the lion, and honey.
korean_text: 얼마 후에 삼손이 그 여자를 맞이하려고 다시 가다가 돌이켜 그 사자의 주검을 본즉 사자의 몸에 벌 떼와 꿀이 있는지라

sentences.original_text: After some days he returned to take her.
sentences.korean_translation: 며칠 후에 그가 그녀를 데리러 돌아왔습니다.

sentences.original_text: And he turned aside to see the carcass of the lion
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 사자의 주검을 보려고 길을 돌았는데,

sentences.original_text: there was a swarm of bees in the body of the lion
